text: Granolaria salmo is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies.Bouchet, P. (2012). Granolaria salmo (Wood, 1828). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species at http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=607915 on 2012-08-25 ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== * Snyder M.A., Vermeij G.J. & Lyons W.G. (2012) The genera and biogeography of Fasciolariinae (Gastropoda, Neogastropoda, Fasciolariidae). Basteria 76(1-3): 31–70. ==External links== * Category:Fasciolariidae Category:Gastropods described in 1828
title: Granolaria salmo
